Class DatabaseHelperTest

java.lang.Object
databasePart1.DatabaseHelperTest
@TestInstance(PER_CLASS) public class DatabaseHelperTest extends Object
JUnit test class for verifying database operations in the DatabaseHelper class. Tests focus on CRUD operations and resolution status updates for Questions and Answers.

Uses an H2 in-memory database for testing with the following configuration:

  • JDBC URL: jdbc:h2:~/FoundationDatabase
  • Username: sa
  • No password

    • connectToDatabase

      @BeforeAll public void connectToDatabase() throws SQLException
      Establishes database connection before all tests run. Verifies initial database state is empty.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if connection establishment fails
      See Also:
      • DatabaseHelper.connectToDatabase()
      • DatabaseHelper.isDatabaseEmpty()

    • testDeleteQuestion

      @Test public void testDeleteQuestion() throws SQLException
      Tests question deletion functionality.
      1. Creates test question with ID 1
      2. Verifies successful insertion
      3. Deletes the question
      4. Verifies question no longer exists
      Throws:
      SQLException - if any database operation fails
      See Also:
      • DatabaseHelper.addQuestion(Question)
      • DatabaseHelper.deleteQuestion(Question)
      • doesQuestionExist(int)

    • testUpdateResolveToTrue

      @Test @DisplayName("Should update answer resolution status to true") public void testUpdateResolveToTrue() throws SQLException
      Tests updating answer resolution status to true.
      1. Creates parent question and test answer
      2. Sets resolution status to true
      3. Verifies database update
      4. Cleans up test data
      Throws:
      SQLException - if any database operation fails
      See Also:
      • DatabaseHelper.addAnswer(Answer)
      • DatabaseHelper.updateResolve(Answer, boolean)

    • testUpdateResolveToFalse

      @Test @DisplayName("Should update answer resolution status to false") public void testUpdateResolveToFalse() throws SQLException

      2. Sets resolution status to false
      3. Verifies database update
      Throws:

    • testUpdateQuestionResolveToTrue

      @Test @DisplayName("Should update question resolution status to true") public void testUpdateQuestionResolveToTrue() throws SQLException

      1. Creates unresolved question
      2. Sets resolution status to true
      3. Verifies database update
      Throws:
      SQLException - if any database operation fails
      See Also:
      • DatabaseHelper.updateQuestionResolve(Question, boolean)

    • testRequestReviewerRole

      @Test public void testRequestReviewerRole() throws SQLException
      Tests the requestReviewerRole method to ensure that a reviewer request is successfully added to the database.

      The test follows these steps:

      • Connects to the database.
      • Ensures the JDBC driver is loaded and establishes a connection.
      • Checks that no reviewer requests exist initially.
      • Prints the current list of pending reviewer requests.
      • Requests a reviewer role for a user ("guest").
      • Verifies that a new reviewer request has been added to the database.

      Assertions:

      • assertFalse(rs.next()) ensures that no reviewer requests exist before the request.
      • assertTrue(rs.next()) verifies that a new reviewer request exists after the request.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • doesQuestionExist

      private boolean doesQuestionExist(int questionId) throws SQLException
      Checks if a question exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      questionId - ID of the question to check
      Returns:
      true if question exists, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails
